parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
(Use these reference images in accordance with the REFERENCE CONSTRAINTS section.)
Reference constraint:
- Black Lace — Clothing reference images
  - Usage: Use this image for clothing and outfit details only; keep the character’s face and body from the other references.
- Jennifer — Character reference images
  - Usage: Use this image only for the character’s facial identity and expression; do not copy clothing, background, or other details literally.

REFERENCE CONSTRAINTS
Apply these rules when interpreting and combining reference images for this render.
- Name: Minor Flexibility
- Reference fidelity mode: Balanced (Faithful but Stylized)
- Character identity lock: Strict Identity Preservation
- Scene layout lock: Preserve General Spatial Feel
- Camera adjustment allowance: Moderate Reframing Allowed
- Character pose flexibility: Adapt Pose to Task

TASK
Render an image for space 14 / task 17

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.

Image reference: Black Lace — Clothing reference images.
Usage: Use this image for clothing and outfit details only; keep the character’s face and body from the other references.

Image reference: Jennifer — Character reference images.
Usage: Use this image only for the character’s facial identity and expression; do not copy clothing, background, or other details literally.
